Unit report sheet popup: or [C:6:0:1]Plants[C:7:0:0] there.  The number of [C:6:0:1]Drink[C:7:0:0] rations can be seen at the top of the screen.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 或[C:6:0:1]植物[C:7:0:0] 在那里.   [C:6:0:1]饮品[C:7:0:0] 的配给的具体数据可以在屏幕顶端查看.

Unit report sheet popup: Absent alcohol and in warmer weather, you can designate a [C:3:0:0]Water Source[C:7:0:0] from the [C:5:0:1]Zones[C:7:0:0] menu at a river or pond,
商品报告表弹出窗口: 若你在温暖的环境下缺乏酒精, 你可以点选 [C:5:0:1]区域[C:7:0:0] -> [C:3:0:0]水源地[C:7:0:0],然后在河流或池塘中建立取水点

Unit report sheet popup: so that your residents have water to drink.  You'll want one of these anyway for other purposes, like cleaning
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这样你的居民就有水喝了. 不管怎样,你会想要一个这样的东西来做其他的事情,比如清洁

Unit report sheet popup: and certain [C:6:0:0]Workshop[C:7:0:0] tasks.  You may find water underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 以及某些 [C:6:0:0]工坊[C:7:0:0] 工作.  你可以在地下找到水.

Unit report sheet popup: There's some food on the embark [C:6:0:0]Wagon[C:7:0:0], and you can trade for food, but you can also grow your own.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在启程的[C:6:0:0]马车[C:7:0:0]上有一些食物,并且你可以向商队购买食物,但你也可以自己种.

Unit report sheet popup: The [C:6:0:0]Wagon[C:7:0:0] comes with some [C:6:0:1]Seeds[C:7:0:0], but as you might expect, these crops must be grown underground!
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:6:0:0]马车[C:7:0:0]带有一些[C:6:0:1]种子[C:7:0:0],但正如你所料,这些作物必须生长在地下!

Unit report sheet popup: Using [C:5:0:1]Mining[C:7:0:0] orders, you'll need to carve out a rectangular area underground for your [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用[C:5:0:1]开采[C:7:0:0]命令,你需要为你的[C: 6:0:0]农田[C:7:0:0]在地下划出一个矩形区域.

Unit report sheet popup: The underground rectangle must be near the surface, where there is soil (loam, clay, or sand.) One level down should suffice, before you hit rock.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 地下矩形必须靠近地表,有土壤(壤土, 粘土或沙子)的地方. 在你撞到岩石之前,往下一层就够了.

Unit report sheet popup: The highest mountain elevations do not have soil.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在山脉的最顶层是没有土壤的.

Unit report sheet popup: Make sure to leave the ceiling above intact so the underground soil doesn't receive any sunlight.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 确保上面的天花板完好无损,这样地下土壤就不会受到任何阳光照射.

Unit report sheet popup: With a subterranean soil floor exposed, you can place an underground [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 当挖掘到有土壤的地层时,你就可以在土壤上开拓 [C:6:0:0]耕地[C:7:0:0].

Unit report sheet popup: This isn't rich soil, but will suffice for now.  Dig deeper to find better soil.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这不是肥沃的土壤,但现在就足够了. 挖得更深寻找更好的土壤.

Unit report sheet popup: Select [C:5:0:1]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] from the [C:5:0:1]Build[C:7:0:0] menu.  It's in [C:5:0:1]Workshops[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farmplot[C:7:0:0].  Place the [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] on the subterranean soil.
You need to select the crops to be grown each season.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你需要选择每个季节要种植的作物.

Unit report sheet popup: Click on the [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] you placed to pull up the [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] menu.
[C:6:0:1]Plump Helmets[C:7:0:0] are edible and the default [C:6:0:0]Wagon[C:7:0:0] comes with [C:6:0:1]Plump Helmet Spawn[C:7:0:0], which are their "seeds".
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:6:0:1]肉盔菇[C:7:0:0]是可食用的,并且初始的[C:6:0:0]马车[C:7:0:0]上会携带着[C: 6:0:1]肉盔菇菌种[C:7:0:0],这就是它们的"种子".

Unit report sheet popup: Note that you can obtain aboveground [C:6:0:1]Seeds[C:7:0:0] from trade or by eating gathered [C:6:0:1]Plants[C:7:0:0], but aboveground farming exposes your [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0] to dangers and the elements.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 请注意,你可以通过交易或食用收集的[C:6:0:1]植物[C:7:0:0]获得地面上的[C:6:0:1]种子[C:7:0:0],但在地面上耕作会使你的[C:2:0:0]播种者[C:7:0:0]暴露在危险和自然因素中.

Unit report sheet popup: Now your [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0], those that can access both the [C:6:0:0]Farmplot[C:7:0:0] and the [C:6:0:1]Spawn[C:7:0:0], will plant the field, and after a period of growth, they'll be harvested.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 现在,那些能访问[C:6:0:0]耕地[C:7:0:0] 和作物 [C:6:0:1]种子[C:7:0:0]的 [C:2:0:0]播种者[C:7:0:0]们,将会负责种植田地. 作物经过一段时间的生长后就可以收获.

Unit report sheet popup: If you'd like to focus a few of your citizens on farming, which gives skill benefits, you can assign them to the [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0] work detail from the [C:5:0:1]Labor[C:7:0:0] menu.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果你想让你的一些公民专注于农业,这可以提供技能收益,你可以在[C:5:0:1]劳动[C:7:0:0]菜单将他们指派到[C: 2:0:0]播种者[C: 7:0:0]的工作中.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:6:0:1]Fertilizer[C:7:0:0] and skilled [C:2:0:0]Planters[C:7:0:0] have a direct impact on crop yield.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:6:0:1]肥料[C:7:0:0]和熟练的[C:2:0:0]播种者[C:7:0:0]对作物产量有着直接的影响.

Unit report sheet popup: These effects are more pronounced deep underground where you can locate the cavern biome and its rich soil.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这些影响在地下深处更为明显,在那里你可以找到洞穴生物群落及其肥沃的土壤.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:6:0:1]Potash[C:7:0:0] is the fertilizer of choice, and it can be created in the [C:6:0:0]Ashery[C:7:0:0], using [C:6:0:1]Ash[C:7:0:0] from [C:6:0:1]Wood[C:7:0:0] burned in a [C:6:0:0]Wood Furnace[C:7:0:0].  A [C:3:0:0]Water Source[C:7:0:0] zone and a [C:6:0:1]Bucket[C:7:0:0] are also required.
If there is a river or pond nearby you may consider fishing.  If the water isn't frozen, a worker with the
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果附近有河流或池塘,你可以考虑钓鱼. 如果水没有结冰,工人就会

Unit report sheet popup: fishing labor assigned will begin fishing automatically.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 被分配的捕鱼工作的劳工们将会自动开始捕鱼.

Unit report sheet popup: You can optionally choose to designate a [C:3:0:0]Fishing[C:7:0:0] zone if you don't want your workers going far afield.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果你不想让你的工人们去很远的地方,你可以选择指定一个[C:3:0:0]钓鱼[C:7:0:0]区域.

Unit report sheet popup: Remember, your workers do not eat raw fish!  You must build a [C:6:0:0]Fishery[C:7:0:0] to prepare them.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 记住,你的工人们不吃生鱼!你必须建立一个[C:6:0:0] 渔场[C:7:0:0]来处理生鱼.

Unit report sheet popup: It is possible to survive by gathering plants outside.  Do this by selecting the [C:5:0:1]Gathering[C:7:0:0] order.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 通过收集外面的的植物来维持生计是可行的. 可以通过[C:5:0:1]收集[C:7:0:0]命令来进行植物收集.

Unit report sheet popup: Then draw a rectangle over the bushes you wish to search.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 然后在你想要搜索的灌木丛上画一个矩形.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:6:0:1]Meat[C:7:0:0] from [C:2:0:0]Livestock[C:7:0:0] you slaughter is a source of food.
To slaughter an [C:2:0:0]Animal[C:7:0:0] you must first build a [C:6:0:0]Butcher's Shop[C:7:0:0].
Do this by selecting the building in [C:5:0:1]Workshops[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Farming[C:7:0:0] -> [C:5:0:1]Butcher[C:7:0:0].
Once the shop is built, open the [C:5:0:1]Creatures[C:7:0:0] info menu.  From there select the [C:5:0:1]Pets/Livestock[C:7:0:0] tab.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 商店建好后, 打开 [C:5:0:1]生物[C:7:0:0] 信息菜单.  从里面选择 [C:5:0:1]宠物/牲畜[C:7:0:0] 选项卡.

Unit report sheet popup: There you can select which [C:2:0:0]Animals[C:7:0:0] to slaughter.  You may need to minimize the tutorial to see the [C:5:0:1]Slaughter[C:7:0:0] buttons.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这里你可以选择要屠宰的[C:2:0:0]动物[C:7:0:0] . 可能需要把教程最小化后才能看到[C:5:0:1]屠宰[C:7:0:0]按钮.

Unit report sheet popup: Note that some [C:2:0:0]Livestock[C:7:0:0] must eat vegetation to survive.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 请注意,一些[C:2:0:0]牲畜[C:7:0:0]必须吃植被才能生存.

Unit report sheet popup: To keep them alive use the [C:3:0:0]Pen/Pasture[C:7:0:0] zone from the [C:5:0:1]Zones[C:7:0:0] menu to select a section of grass and click the
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为了让他们活着,使用[C:5:0:1]区域[C:7:0:0]菜单中的[C:3:0:0]围栏/牧场[C:7:0:0]区域来选中一片草地,并点击

Unit report sheet popup: [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0] are areas you designate where your citizens will work, socialize, rest, or perform specific duties.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:3:0:0]区域[C:7:0:0]是你指定的一片区域,你的公民将在这里工作, 社交, 休息或履行特定职责.

Unit report sheet popup: There are several kinds of [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0], which you can see in the panel on the left.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 有几种不同类型的[C:3:0:0]区域[C:7:0:0],你可以在左边的面板中找到他们.

Unit report sheet popup: Certain [C:3:0:0]Zones[C:7:0:0] like [C:3:0:0]Bedrooms[C:7:0:0] can be placed several at a time.
Just make sure you have the correct [C:6:0:0]Furniture[C:7:0:0] placed in the rooms with [C:6:0:0]Doors[C:7:0:0] or vertical entries separating each room before you begin.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 只要确保你拿对了 [C:6:0:0]家具[C:7:0:0] 在房间里放置 [C:6:0:0]门[C:7:0:0] 或者在你开始之前用垂直入口分隔房间

Unit report sheet popup: [C:1:0:0]Burrows[C:7:0:0] are work and living areas where citizens can be assigned.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:1:0:0]洞所[C:7:0:0]是可以分配给矮人用以工作和生活的区域.

Unit report sheet popup: Workers will try to limit their tasks to the confines of the [C:1:0:0]Burrow[C:7:0:0], but they will sometimes form paths which pass through other areas.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 工人们会试图把他们的工作限制在[C:1:0:0]洞所[C:7:0:0]的范围内,但他们有时会形成穿过其他区域的路径.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:1:0:0]Burrows[C:7:0:0] can be suspended and unsuspended freely.  When a [C:1:0:0]Burrow[C:7:0:0] is suspended, assigned citizens will ignore it.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:1:0:0]洞所[C:7:0:0] 可以随时停用和启用.  当[C:1:0:0]洞所[C:7:0:0]停用时,被指派的矮人就会无视它.

Unit report sheet popup: It can be useful to assign all of your civilians to a safe emergency [C:1:0:0]Burrow[C:7:0:0] which you activate in case of intruders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在有入侵的情况下,激活一个安全的紧急避难[C:1:0:0]洞所[C:7:0:0]并将你的所有平民指派进去,是很有用的.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:6:0:1]Minecarts[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:0]Tracks[C:7:0:0] are a convenient way to move a lot of objects around the fortress quickly, though they take a little effort to prepare.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:6:0:1]矿车[C:7:0:0]和[C:6:0:0]轨道[C:7:0:0]是一种在要塞周围方便且快速移动大量物品的方式,尽管它们需要一些准备工作.

Unit report sheet popup: One [C:6:0:1]Minecart[C:7:0:0] can be assigned to each route, and workers will move the vehicle from [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0] to [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0] according to conditions you specify.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 可以为每条路线分配一个[C:6:0:1]矿车[C:7:0:0],矮人将根据您指定的条件将矿车从一个[C:6:0:0]轨道:停靠站[C:7:0:0]移动到另一个[C:6:0:0]轨道:停靠站[C:7:0:0] .

Unit report sheet popup: Each [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0] must be linked to a [C:6:0:0]Stockpile[C:7:0:0] for [C:6:0:1]Items[C:7:0:0] to be put on or removed from the [C:6:0:1]Minecart[C:7:0:0].
Only one condition needs to be satisfied for the [C:6:0:1]Minecart[C:7:0:0] to move to the next [C:6:0:0]Track Stop[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 只需要满足一个条件 [C:6:0:1]矿车[C:7:0:0] 移动到下一个 [C:6:0:0]轨道:停靠站[C:7:0:0].

Unit report sheet popup: [C:6:0:1]Minecarts[C:7:0:0] that move too quickly around corners will spill their contents.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:6:0:1]矿车[C:7:0:0]在转弯处移动太快时会把矿车里的东西甩出来.

Unit report sheet popup: When a route has a steep descent, consider using powered [C:6:0:0]Rollers[C:7:0:0], extra curves, track "stops" between [C:6:0:0]Stops[C:7:0:0] with various friction settings, or a worker to guide the vehicle.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 当一条路线有一个急剧的下降,可以考虑使用电动的[C:6:0:0]滚动辊[C:7:0:0], 额外的曲线, 在[C:6:0:0]站[C:7:0:0]之间的轨道"站点"加上各种摩擦力设置,或者使用一个工人来引导车辆.

Unit report sheet popup: Here you can see every [C:6:0:1]Item[C:7:0:0] in the fortress.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里你可以看到要塞中的所有[C:6:0:1]物品[C:7:0:0].

Unit report sheet popup: Click on category headings to collapse and expand them.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 单击类别标题折叠并展开它们.

Unit report sheet popup: If you don't have a [C:5:0:0]Bookkeeper[C:7:0:0], or they don't have an [C:3:0:0]Office[C:7:0:0] to work in, numbers may be approximate.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果你没有一位[C:5:0:0]簿记员[C:7:0:0],或者他没有一间用来工作的[C:3:0:0]办公室[C:7:0:0],那么你库存中显示的数量将是模糊的大概的.

Unit report sheet popup: Work details are one way you can control which workers do which tasks, and they are the only way to assign certain tasks like mining, woodcutting, hunting, and fishing.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 工作细节是一种可以控制哪些工人执行哪些任务的方法,也是分配采矿, 伐木, 狩猎和钓鱼等特定任务的唯一方法.

Unit report sheet popup: Generally, almost every task will be available for every citizen, but you can both restrict both citizens and tasks.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一般来说,几乎每个任务都对每个公民可用,但你可以同时限制公民和任务.

Unit report sheet popup: Citizens are restricted by using their [C:5:0:1]Specialization[C:7:0:0] button.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用[C:5:0:1]Specialization[C:7:0:0]按钮来控制是否让矮人只做分配的工作.

Unit report sheet popup: Tasks are restricted by setting their work detail to [C:5:0:1]"Only selected do this"[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 通过工作清单里的[C:5:0:1]"Only selected do this"[C:7:0:0]按钮来只让选中的人做这部分工作.

Unit report sheet popup: If a task does not have a default work detail, you can create a custom work detail.  Once you assign citizens to the task, you can then set [C:5:0:1]"Only selected do this"[C:7:0:0] if you want to restrict it.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果一份工作没有默认的工作清单支持,你可以新建一个自定义的工作清单. 一旦你为这个工作清单指派了矮人,你便可以设定[C:5:0:1]"只有被选中的人才做这个"[C:7:0:0]来精准的控制它.

Unit report sheet popup: Here you can view your nobles, as well as assign your administrators, military leaders, and other officials.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里你可以看到你的贵族,分配你的管理员,军事领导者,及其他职员.

Unit report sheet popup: Once the first leader is assigned, subsequent [C:5:0:0]Captain[C:7:0:0] positions will appear.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一旦第一个领导者委派了矮人,随后[C:5:0:0]队长[C:7:0:0]的职位设置就会出现.

Unit report sheet popup: These can also be assigned from the squad menu.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这些也可以从小队菜单中分配.

Unit report sheet popup: Certain important functions in your fortress can only be performed by assigned administrators, such as the [C:5:0:0]Manager[C:7:0:0] and [C:5:0:0]Bookkeeper[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 要塞中的某些重要工作只能由指定的管理员执行,例如[C:5:0:0]经理人[C:7:0:0]和[C:5:0:0]簿记员[C:7:0:0].

Unit report sheet popup: Once they are assigned, you can create work orders, run a [C:1:0:1]Hospital[C:7:0:0], and count and appraise your hoard.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一旦他们被分配,你可以创建工作指令,去运作一所 [C:1:0:1]医院[C:7:0:0], 同时为你的贮藏进行估量和统计.

Unit report sheet popup: Nobles and certain administrators require rooms, and some may also make demands.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 贵族和某些管理员需要房间,有些人还会提出要求.

Unit report sheet popup: If you have a law enforcement administrator like a [C:5:0:0]Sheriff[C:7:0:0] or [C:5:0:0]Captain of the Guard[C:7:0:0], witnesses of crimes will make reports, which find their way here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果你有一个执法部门的管理人员像是一个 [C:5:0:0]警长[C:7:0:0] 或者 [C:5:0:0]警卫队队长 [C:7:0:0], 犯罪目击者会将报道传到这里.

Unit report sheet popup: Certain crimes are indicative of larger problems, so you should pay attention to them, and affected victims and family members get upset if crime is ignored.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 某些犯罪预示着更大的问题,所以你应该关注他们,如果犯罪被忽视,受害者和家庭成员会感到不安.

Unit report sheet popup: It's up to you to choose whom to convict.
All available witness information is presented for each case.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 每个案件都提供了所有可用的证人信息.

Unit report sheet popup: This is particularly important for schemes where the witnesses might not have the full story.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这对于证人可能不了解全部情况的计划尤其重要.

Unit report sheet popup: It is recommended to place a certain number of [C:6:0:0]Cages[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:0]Chains[C:7:0:0] and assign them to a [C:3:0:0]Dungeon[C:7:0:0] zone.
Officers may opt for physical punishment if they cannot carry out custodial sentences.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果法官不执行监禁判决,那他们可以选择体罚.

Unit report sheet popup: Here you can create squads, fill their positions, assign equipment and schedules, and give specific orders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里你可以创建小队,填补他们的位置,分配装备和时间表,并给出具体的命令.

Unit report sheet popup: Although this location is relatively safe, it is recommended that you prepare a squad and get them training at some point.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 虽然这个位置相对安全,但建议你准备一个小队,让他们在某个时候训练.

Unit report sheet popup: Wildlife and even your own citizens can still be dangerous at times.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 野生动物,甚至你自己的公民有时仍然是危险的.

Unit report sheet popup: It is recommended that you prepare a squad and get them training as soon as you can.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 建议你准备一个阵容,让他们尽快训练.

Unit report sheet popup: You have no idea what's lurking out there.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你无法得知那里潜伏着什么.

Unit report sheet popup: The world created at the beginning of the game is active, and others may take an interest in your outpost as it grows.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 游戏开始时创建的世界是活跃的,随着前哨站的发展,其他人可能会对它产生兴趣.

Unit report sheet popup: Stolen [C:6:0:1]Artifacts[C:7:0:0] and kidnapped citizens can be recovered by preparing missions from this screen.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 被盗的[C:6:0:1]神器[C:7:0:0]以及被绑架的公民可以通过此屏幕上的装备任务来恢复.

Unit report sheet popup: You can also cause trouble if you'd like to raid your neighbors.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果你想突袭你的邻居,你也可以制造麻烦.

Unit report sheet popup: Raids are created by clicking on any site not belonging to your civilization.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 突袭是通过点击任何不属于你的文明的定居点来创建的.

Unit report sheet popup: Work orders are used to automate [C:3:0:1]Tasks[C:7:0:0] in [C:6:0:0]Workshops[C:7:0:0].
These work orders are set to complete a certain number of [C:3:0:1]Tasks[C:7:0:0] and can be given start conditions.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这些工作指令是为了完成一定数量的[C:3:0:1]任务[C:7:0:0]并且满足开始条件而设定的

Unit report sheet popup: For instance, you can create an order to [C:3:0:1]Make Wooden Bins[C:7:0:0] if you are out of empty ones, to [C:3:0:1]Brew Drinks[C:7:0:0] if you are running low, or to [C:3:0:1]Make Five Statues[C:7:0:0] every month.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 例如,你可以在没有空的储物箱时创建一个订单来[C:3:0:1]制作木制储物箱[C:7:0:0] ,在你快喝完酒时 [C:3:0:1]酿酒[C:7:0:0] , 或者每个月[C:3:0:1]制作5个雕像[C:7:0:0] .

Unit report sheet popup: You can limit work orders to a number of [C:6:0:0]Workshops[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以将工作清单限制在一定数量的[C:6:0:0]工坊[C:7:0:0]中.

Unit report sheet popup: You can also create work orders at specific [C:6:0:0]Workshops[C:7:0:0] from their building sheet.

Unit report sheet popup: The system is reasonably powerful and you can eventually automate almost all of your production if you wish.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该系统相当强大,如果你愿意,你最终可以自动化几乎所有的生产.

Unit report sheet popup: If you find that your stockpiles are filling up too fast, you can create room by building [C:6:0:1]Bins[C:7:0:0],
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果你发现你的储物堆满的太快,为了腾出空间你可以建造 一些[C:6:0:1]箱子[C:7:0:0],

Unit report sheet popup: [C:6:0:1]Barrels[C:7:0:0], and [C:6:0:1]Bags[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Barrels[C:7:0:0] are used to store [C:6:0:1]Food[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Bags[C:7:0:0] are used to store [C:6:0:1]Seeds[C:7:0:0]
(and some other things like [C:6:0:1]Sand[C:7:0:0]).  [C:6:0:1]Bins[C:7:0:0] hold just about everything else except [C:6:0:1]Furniture[C:7:0:0], [C:6:0:1]Wood[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:1]Boulders[C:7:0:0].
The [C:6:0:0]Carpenter's Workshop[C:7:0:0] is the best place to make lightweight [C:6:0:1]Bins[C:7:0:0] and [C:6:0:1]Barrels[C:7:0:0], but they can also be made at
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:6:0:0]木匠工坊[C:7:0:0]是制造重量轻的[C:6:0:1]储物箱[C:7:0:0]和[C:6:0:1]圆桶[C:7:0:0]最好的地方,同时这两种物品也可以被制造于

Unit report sheet popup: the [C:6:0:0]Stoneworker's Shop[C:7:0:0] and the [C:6:0:0]Metalsmith's Forge[C:7:0:0].  [C:6:0:1]Bags[C:7:0:0] are created at the [C:6:0:0]Clothier's Shop[C:7:0:0] or the [C:6:0:0]Leatherworks[C:7:0:0].
When the caravan arrives at the [C:6:0:0]Trade Depot[C:7:0:0], you must click on the depot and select [C:5:0:1]"Bring Goods to Depot"[C:7:0:0].
商品报告表弹出窗口: 当旅行商队到达[C:6:0:0]交易站[C:7:0:0]时,你需要单击交易站,然后选择[C:5:0:1]"将货物放进仓库"[C:7:0:0]

Unit report sheet popup: Here you can select which goods you wish to trade.  After everyone has brought their goods you can

商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择[C:5:0:1]"交易"[C:7:0:0]. 如果你没有[C:5:0:0]代理商[C:7:0:0]也不用担心,只需要选择"[C:5:0:1]所有人都可以交易"[C:7:0:0]. 你不能交易

商品报告表弹出窗口: 交易时,您可以从左侧的列表中选择您想要的商品,并选择您的商品

Unit report sheet popup: trade from the list on the right.  Then hit [C:5:0:1]"Trade"[C:7:0:0].  The trader will accept if the deal is fair and

Unit report sheet popup: they can carry away the weight of the things you are selling.

Other nobles may appear or be assigned as

商品报告表弹出窗口: 你以后可以改用其他形式的[C:6:0:1]燃料[C:7:0:0],如[C:6:0:1]煤[C:7:0:0],但你通常会

Unit report sheet popup: It is a dangerous world, and if the entrances of your fortress are left open,
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这是一个危险的世界,如果你的堡垒的入口敞开着,

Unit report sheet popup: The best way to avoid this fate is to build traps and
商品报告表弹出窗口: 避免这种命运的最好办法就是设置陷阱

Unit report sheet popup: lock the ways into your fortress.  The ways to build traps are as wild as your imagination.

These require a [C:6:0:1]Weapon[C:7:0:0], [C:6:0:1]Cage[C:7:0:0], or [C:6:0:1]Boulder[C:7:0:0] to function.
Non-alcoholic water is essential to a functioning fortress.  The most favored place to
商品报告表弹出窗口: 不含酒精的纯净水对一个要塞的正常运行是至关重要的. 最受欢迎的地方
它是从一口[C:6:0:0]井[C:7:0:0]里得到的.

商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种简单的方法是重新指定潮湿的石头进行挖掘,以便在楼梯周围建造一个3x3的房间.

Unit report sheet popup: Repeat this pattern until you get below the aquifer.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 重复这个过程直到你到达地下蓄水层.

Unit report sheet popup: While it is possible to trade for [C:6:0:1]Clothing[C:7:0:0], [C:6:0:1]Cloth[C:7:0:0], or [C:6:0:1]Leather[C:7:0:0], you can also farm [C:6:0:1]Pigtails[C:7:0:0],

Unit report sheet popup: Designate this zone as the top of a pond.  Citizens will bring buckets of water if the pond below isn't filled.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 把这个区域指定为池塘的顶部.  如果下面的池塘没有被填满,市民们会带来水桶.

Unit report sheet popup: Select animals to be dropped into the pit or pond below this zone.  Animals will not feel obligated to stay if they can find a way out.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择要放入该区域下方的坑或池塘中的动物.  如果动物能找到出路,它们就不会觉得有义务留下来.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a new or existing location to this zone.  Locations are groups of zones and rooms with a larger purpose, like a tavern, a temple, a library, or a craft guildhall.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将一个新的或现有的地点指派给这个区域.  地点是由区域和房间组成的,具有比较大型的用途,如酒馆, 寺庙, 图书馆或手工业行会.

Unit report sheet popup: Set details for the assigned location.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 设置指定位置的详细信息.

Unit report sheet popup: Select this option and any unassigned deceased citizens will be buried here automatically.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择这个选项,任何未分配的已故公民将自动埋在这里.

Unit report sheet popup: Select this option and any unassigned deceased pets will be buried here automatically.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择这个选项,任何未分配的已故宠物都将自动埋在这里.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose which squads will use this barracks.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择哪些小队将使用这个营房.

Unit report sheet popup: Remove the zone being painted permanently.  Also removes existing zones!
商品报告表弹出窗口: 永久移除正在涂漆的区域. 并且删除现有区域!

Unit report sheet popup: Your citizens will drink at a water source zone or gather water using buckets for various tasks.  This is useful if you don't have a functioning well and you want to control exactly where the tasks take place.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你的公民将在水源区喝水,或用水桶为各种任务收集水.  如果你没有有效的水井,而你又想控制任务发生的确切位置,这就很有用.

Unit report sheet popup: Citizens assigned to the fishing work detail will fish in this zone if it exists.  Otherwise, they will fish everywhere.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 分配到捕鱼工作细节的市民将在该区域捕鱼(如果存在). 否则,他们会到处钓鱼.

Unit report sheet popup: Plant gathering zones are used in locations where plants will be gathered frequently.  Use the gather designation otherwise.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 植物采集区用于经常采集植物的地方.  在其他情况下,请使用采集指定.

Unit report sheet popup: Items designated for dumping will be tossed into open air spaces included in this zone.  If no open air tiles are included, they will dump the items on the floor.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 被指定为倾倒的物品将被扔到包括在这个区域的露天空间.  如果没有包括露天空间的瓷砖,他们将把物品扔在地上.

Unit report sheet popup: Certain livestock need to graze on grass.  Assign these animals to a pasture zone.  No fencing is needed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 某些牲畜需要在草地上吃草. 将这些动物分配到牧场区. 不需要围栏.

Unit report sheet popup: Animals assigned to pit/pond zones are dumped in the pit, but will leave the zone afterward if possible.  If the pit is designated as a pond, your citizens will attempt to fill it with water using buckets.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 被分配到坑/池塘区的动物被扔在坑里,但如果可能的话,之后会离开该区.  如果坑被指定为池塘,你的公民将试图用水桶将其填满.

Unit report sheet popup: Your citizens will fill sand bags at this zone if a sandy floor or sandy wall is included.  This task is initiated manually at the glass furnace.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果包括沙地或沙墙,你的公民将在这个区域填充沙袋.  这个任务是在玻璃熔炉处手动启动的.

Unit report sheet popup: Your citizens will collect clay at this zone if a clay floor or clay wall is included.  This task is initiated manually at the kiln.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果包括粘土地面或粘土墙,你的公民将在这个区域收集粘土.  这个任务是在窑洞里手动启动的.

Unit report sheet popup: This important zone is where your citizens will gather to socialize.  Crucially, the meeting area is where locations such as taverns, temples, hospitals, and the like are established.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个重要区域是您的公民聚集社交的地方.  至关重要的是,会议区是建立酒馆, 寺庙, 医院等场所的地方.

Unit report sheet popup: Animals that are capable of being trained receive their training at this zone once they have been assigned a trainer from the Pets/Livestock menu.  Generally, a piece of meat is required.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 能够接受训练的动物一旦从宠物/家畜菜单中被分配了训练师,就会在该区域接受训练. 一般来说,一块肉是必须的.

Unit report sheet popup: Your citizens will sleep in bedrooms.  It should include a bed!  Try to enclose it with walls and/or doors.  Do not overlap with other rooms.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你的公民将睡在卧室里.  它应该包括一张床! 尝试用墙壁和/或门将其封闭.  (不能与其他房间重叠)

Unit report sheet popup: Your citizens will eat at this zone.  When not assigned to a particular citizen, citizens without their own dining hall will eat here.  Tables and adjacent chairs should be included.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你的市民将在此处就餐.  若没有分配给特定市民,则未分配食堂的市民也会在这里用餐(需要包括桌子和相邻的椅子)

Unit report sheet popup: An office or study is required for certain official tasks, such as approving work orders and bookkeeping.  A chair or throne is required for these functions.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 某些办公任务需要办公室或书房,例如批准工作订单和簿记. 这些功能需要椅子或宝座.

Unit report sheet popup: Your archers can train in this zone if there is an archery target included.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 如果此处有靶子,则您的弓箭手可在此训练

Unit report sheet popup: Squads should be assigned to a barracks.  The squad can be set to train, sleep, and store equipment there.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 小队需要被分配到一个军营.  小队可以设置为在那里训练, 睡觉和存放装备.

Unit report sheet popup: Dormitories should include multiple beds and will not belong to a particular citizen.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 宿舍应包括多张床,不属于特定居民.

Unit report sheet popup: Prisoners convicted in the Justice menu can be incarcerated at a chain or metal cage in the dungeon zone.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在司法菜单中被定罪的囚犯可以被监禁在地牢区的铁链或金属笼子里.

Unit report sheet popup: Deceased citizens and pets can be laid to rest in a tomb.  It should include a coffin, casket, or sarcophagus.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 死去的公民和宠物可以被安放在坟墓里.  它应该包括一个棺材,匣子,或石棺.

Unit report sheet popup: Establish burrows to organize work and living spaces in larger fortresses.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在较大的堡垒中建立洞穴来组织工作和生活空间.

Unit report sheet popup: Remove the burrow being painted permanently.  Also removes existing burrows!
商品报告表弹出窗口: 永久性地清除被涂抹的洞穴.  同时也能清除现有的洞穴!

Unit report sheet popup: Erase a portion of this burrow.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 抹去这个洞穴的一部分.
永久性地清除这个洞穴.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether workshops can source materials from outside the burrow.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换工场是否能从洞穴外获取材料.

Unit report sheet popup: Suspend this burrow.  Assigned citizens will not respect burrow restrictions while a burrow is suspended, but all tasks within the burrow will still function.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 暂停这个洞穴.  当一个洞穴被暂停时,分配的公民将不尊重洞穴的限制,但洞穴内的所有任务仍将运作.

Unit report sheet popup: Add a stop to this route.  Minecarts will move between stops when conditions are satisfied.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为这条路线添加一个停靠点. 当条件满足时,矿车将在站点之间移动.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a minecart to this route.  Only one vehicle can operate on each route.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为这条路线分配一个矿车. 每条路线只能运行一辆车.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the items desired by the minecart at this stop.  Items must be in a linked stockpile.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这一站设置矿车所需的物品.  物品必须是在一个链接的库存中.

Unit report sheet popup: Link a stockpile to this stop.  Citizens will haul items to and from the minecart as you specify.  Items for the minecart must be specified using the desired items button to the left.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将库存链接到此站点. 市民将按照您指定的方式将物品运进和运出矿车. 必须使用左侧的所需物品按钮指定矿车的物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Set conditions for the minecart to move on to the next stop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为矿车移动到下一站设置条件.

Unit report sheet popup: The assigned vehicle is at this stop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 指定车辆正在此站点停靠.

Unit report sheet popup: The assigned vehicle is moving toward this stop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 指定的车辆正在驶向该停靠点.

Unit report sheet popup: The assigned vehicle wants to be at this stop but is not currently there.  A worker may be bringing it, or it may be stranded.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 被分配的车辆想在这一站,但目前不在那里.  可能有工作人员带着它,也可能是它被搁置了.

Unit report sheet popup: Open the nobles and administrators menu.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 打开贵族和管理员菜单.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the stockpile allows plant and animal-based objects, regardless of other settings.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换库存是否允许基于植物和动物的物体,而不考虑其他设置.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the stockpile allows non-plant-and-animal-based objects, regardless of other settings.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换库存是否允许非植物和动物的物体,不考虑其他设置.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether goods banned by export mandates are listed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换是否列出出口授权禁止的货物.

Unit report sheet popup: Sort by distance from the depot.
Leave menu and recenter the view on the time.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开菜单,将视图重新集中在时间上.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave menu and open the item's sheet.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开菜单,打开项目的工作表.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle the forbidden status of the item.  Citizens will not use forbidden items or buildings.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换项目的禁止状态.  公民不会使用违禁物品或建筑物.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle the dump status of the item.  Items are dumped in dumping zones.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换物品的倾倒状态.  物品被倾倒在倾倒区.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle the melt status of the item.  Items are melted at any smelter.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换物品的融化状态. 物品可在任何冶炼厂熔化.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle the visibility of the item.  Hidden items cannot be seen but citizens will still use them.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换物品的可见性.  隐藏的物品不能被看到,但市民仍会使用它们.

Unit report sheet popup: Create a new work order.  Work orders are like workshop jobs but they are assigned to shops automatically and can be activated with various conditions.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 创建一个新的指令.  指令就像车间的工作,但它们被自动分配到车间,并可以用各种条件激活.

Unit report sheet popup: This work order is checking its conditions for activation.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该工作订单正检查其激活条件.

Unit report sheet popup: This work order is ready to activate.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该工作订单已准备好被激活.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the maximum number of workshops that can be used by the work order.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 设置工作订单可被最多用于多少个工坊.

Unit report sheet popup: This work order has been validated by the manager.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该工作订单已被经理人设置为生效.

Unit report sheet popup: This work order has not been validated by the manager.  A manager can be employed in the nobles and administrators menu, and they must have an assigned office where they will work to validate orders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 此工单尚未由经理验证. 可以在贵族和管理员菜单中启用经理,他们必须有一个指定的办公室,他们将在那里工作以验证订单.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the number of times the task will be performed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 更改任务将被执行的次数.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the work order priority.  Work orders at the top of the list will use workshops first.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 更改工作订单的优先级. 工坊将首先完成位于列表顶端的工作订单.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the conditions for work order activation.  This can involve needed materials, the current stock of products, or the completion of other work orders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 设置工单激活的条件. 这可能涉及所需材料, 当前产品库存或其他工单的完成情况.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the material used or other details of the task.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 设置任务使用的材料或其他详细信息.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the frequency that the conditions are checked.
Add a condition to the work order that checks the amount of some item.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为工作订单添加检查物品数量时设定的条件.

Unit report sheet popup: Make the activation of the work order depend on the status of another work order.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使工单的激活取决于另一个工单的状态.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the amount of the item being checked.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 更改要检查的物品的数量.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the inequality of the condition.
Change the type of the item being checked.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 改变被检查项目的类型.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the material of the item being checked.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 改变被检查物品的材料.

Unit report sheet popup: Change the properties of the item being checked.  Many of these are obscure and rely on specific tasks, but certain properties like 'empty' can be used in many conditions.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 改变被检查项目的属性.  其中许多是晦涩难懂的,依赖于特定的任务,但某些属性如'空'可以在许多条件下使用.

Unit report sheet popup: Change whether the work order must be activated or completed to satisfy this condition.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 改变指令是否必须被激活或完成以满足这个条件.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and recenter on this creature.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开该菜单并重定位至该生物.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and view this creature's sheet.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开该菜单并查看这个生物的列表.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and recenter on this object.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开该菜单并重定位至该物体.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and view this object's sheet.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开该菜单并查看这个物品的列表.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and recenter on this place.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开该菜单并重定位至该地区.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and view this place's sheet or menu.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开该菜单并查看该地区的列表或菜单.

Unit report sheet popup: Leave this menu and recenter on the task's building.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 离开这个菜单,重新定位到任务的建筑上.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the details of this task, such as the material used.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 设置该任务的细节,例如使用什么材料.

Unit report sheet popup: View a detailed description of this activity.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 检查该活动的描述详情.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the task will be repeated indefinitely.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换是否无限重复任务.

Unit report sheet popup: Remove the current worker from the task.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将工人从当前任务中移除.

Unit report sheet popup: Suspend this task.  This removes the worker.  The task can be unsuspended.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 暂停此任务. 这将移除工人. 可以取消暂停任务.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a trainer to this creature.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为该生物指派一个驯兽师.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign this creature as a work animal for a specific citizen or resident.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将该生物指派给一个特定的居民或长期居住者作为工作动物.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether this creature will receive war training.  War animals have more lethal attacks.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换该生物是否会接受战斗训练.  战斗动物有更多机会发起致命攻击.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether this creature will receive hunting training.  Hunting animals can move stealthfully during hunts.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换该生物是否会接受狩猎训练.  狩猎动物在狩猎过程中可以隐蔽地移动.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether this creature is available as a pet for any interested citizen or resident.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换这种生物是否可以作为宠物供任何感兴趣的公民或居民使用.

Unit report sheet popup: This creature is ecstatic right now.
This creature is happy right now.
This creature is pleased right now.
This creature is content right now.
This creature is displeased right now.
This creature is unhappy right now.
This creature is miserable right now.
This worker is specialized and will only do tasks that match their workshop assignments, work details, and occupations.  Click to toggle.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这是个专职工人,只会做与车间分配, 工作细节和职业相匹配的任务. 单击可切换.

Unit report sheet popup: This worker is not specialized and will do any free tasks that become available.  Click to toggle.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个工人无专职工作,可以做任何自由任务. 单击切换.

Unit report sheet popup: This creature is a tavern keeper.
This creature is a monster slayer.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物是一名怪物猎手.

Unit report sheet popup: This creature is assigned to a specific workshop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物被指派到一个特定的工坊.

Unit report sheet popup: This creature is assigned to a work detail.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物被指派给一项工作细节.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether this creature will be slaughtered at a butcher's shop when the opportunity arises.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换这种生物是否会在有机会的时候在肉店被宰杀.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether this creature will be gelded at a farmer's workshop when the opportunity arises.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换这个生物在合适时是否会在农用工场被阉割.

Unit report sheet popup: This type is not relevant to brewing.
This type is restricted from brewing.
This type is allowed to be brewed.
This type is not relevant to cooking.
This type is restricted from cooking.
This type is allowed to be cooked.
This option allows visitors from outside the fortress to enter this location.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 此选项允许要塞外的游客进入该地点.

Unit report sheet popup: This option allows long-term residents of the fortress to enter this location.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个选项允许堡垒的长期居民进入这个地方.

Unit report sheet popup: This option indicates that the location is only open to fortress citizens.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个选项表示该地点只对要塞公民开放.

Unit report sheet popup: This option indicates that the location is only open to members.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该选项表示该地点只对成员开放.

Unit report sheet popup: Remove this worker from this occupation.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将该工人从该职业中移除.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the camera to follow this item.
This item is tagged by a task and will not be used by other tasks.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个物品已被某个任务选用,无法再用于其他任务.

Unit report sheet popup: Customize this creature's nickname and profession nickname.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 自定义这个生物的昵称和职业昵称.

Unit report sheet popup: Set the camera to follow this creature.
Send this creature to a linked site, or expel this creature entirely.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 把这个生物送到一个链接的站点,或者完全驱逐这个生物.

Unit report sheet popup: This item is part of the assigned squad equipment.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这件物品是已分配小队装备的一部分

Unit report sheet popup: This item is a tool assigned by a work detail.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个项目是由一个工作细节分配的工具.

Unit report sheet popup: This item is a symbol of a noble or administrator.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这件物品是贵族或管理员的象征.

Unit report sheet popup: This item is part of the creature's regular clothing.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个项目是该生物常规服装的一部分.
查看有关该知识的细节.

Unit report sheet popup: This task has been assigned and is active.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该任务已被指派且已激活.

Unit report sheet popup: This task came from a work order.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该任务来自一项工作订单.

Unit report sheet popup: This task is set to repeat indefinitely.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该任务已被设置为无限重复.

Unit report sheet popup: Click to set this task to repeat indefinitely.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 单击可将此任务设置为无限重复.

Unit report sheet popup: This task is highest priority among all tasks everywhere.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个任务是所有任务中优先级最高的.

Unit report sheet popup: Click to set this task as highest priority among all tasks everywhere.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 点击将此任务设置为各地所有任务中的最高优先级.

Unit report sheet popup: Increase the priority of the task in this workshop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 提高该任务在这个工坊里的优先级.

Unit report sheet popup: Set details for this task, such as the material to be used.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为这项任务设置细节,如要使用的材料.

Unit report sheet popup: Click to suspend the task.  Assigned workers are removed from suspended tasks.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 点击暂停任务.  已分配的工人将从暂停的任务中移除.

Unit report sheet popup: Create a new work order for this workshop.  Work orders are tasks that can repeat specified numbers of times and which can be given start conditions.  This is useful for automation.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为这个工坊创建一个新工单,工单是可以重复指定次数的任务,并且可以给定启动条件. 这对自动化很有用.
重新定位在链接的建筑物上.

Unit report sheet popup: Add stockpile links for this workshop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为这个车间添加库存区链接.

Unit report sheet popup: This item is a permanent part of the building.  Forbid and visibility tags set here affect the whole building.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个项目是建筑物的一个永久的部分.  在这里设置的禁止和可见性标签会影响整个建筑.

Unit report sheet popup: This is a small creature within the trap.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这是一个陷阱中的小生物.

Unit report sheet popup: This item is resting within the building.
This item is a semi-permanent part of the building, like an item on display.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这个项目是建筑的一个半永久性的部分,就像所示项目.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle the forbidden status of the item.  Citizens will not use forbidden items or buildings.  If a permanent building item is forbidden, citizens will not perform tasks there!
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换项目的禁止状态.  公民不会使用禁止物品或建筑物.  如果永久建筑项目被禁止,公民将不会在那里执行任务!

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle the visibility of the item.  Hidden items cannot be seen but citizens will still use them.  If a permanent building item is invisible, the building will be too!
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换项目的可见性.  隐藏的物品是看不见的,但市民仍会使用它们.  如果永久性建筑项目是不可见的,那么建筑也会是!

Unit report sheet popup: The soldiers can either keep their equipment on at all times, or only when an order is active.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将士们可以一直随身携带着他们的装备,或者只在被征召时才带上他们的装备

Unit report sheet popup: The soldiers can be allowed to sleep in their rooms whenever they way, or in the barracks either when they want or only when they must.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 士兵们可以随时睡在自己的房间里,也可以在他们想要或必须的时候睡在军营里.
取消这个职位的预定命令.

Unit report sheet popup: The squad leader is traveling or otherwise occupied off-site.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 班长在旅行或以其他方式在场外活动.

Unit report sheet popup: View the positions in this squad.
Assign a station order.  The soldiers will stand near the point selected and engage any hostile creatures that come near.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 指派一个站位命令.  士兵们将站在选定的点附近,与任何靠近的敌对生物交战.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a kill order.  The soldiers will attempt to kill a targeted creature.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为小队分配杀戮命令. 士兵将尝试杀死目标生物.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a patrol order.  The soldiers will walk a specified route repeatedly.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为小队分配巡逻命令. 士兵会在指定路线上反复巡逻.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a burrow defense order.  The soldiers will patrol the burrow and attack any hostile creatures.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为小队分配保卫洞穴指令. 士兵将巡逻指定的洞穴并攻击任何敌对生物.

Unit report sheet popup: Assign a training order.  The squad must be assigned to a barracks zone with the training option set.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 为小队分配训练指令. 该小队必须被分配至一个训练功能开启的营房.

Unit report sheet popup: Cancel an order.  Does not affect scheduled orders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 取消一个指令.  不影响预定的指令.
重新定位在公告的位置.

Unit report sheet popup: Recenter on the creature (at the time of the announcement.)
商品报告表弹出窗口: 重新定位在生物上(在通知的时候. )

Unit report sheet popup: Recenter on the item (at the time of the announcement.)
商品报告表弹出窗口: 重新关注这个项目(在通知的时候. )

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the squad will sleep here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换小队是否会在这里睡觉.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the squad will train here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换小队是否会在这里训练.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the soldiers will store their individually assigned weapons and armor here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换士兵是否会在这里存放他们单独分配的武器和盔甲.

Unit report sheet popup: Toggle whether the squad will store squad-level equipment here, such as ammunition.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 切换小队是否会在这里存放小队级别的装备,例如弹药.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile to which the track stop's vehicle will give items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个储物堆,轨道站的车辆将会提供物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile from which the track stop's vehicle will take items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个储物堆,轨道站的车辆从那里获取物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile with which the track stop's vehicle will exchange items.  The vehicle will take desired items and offload any others.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个储物堆,轨道站的车辆将与该仓库交换物品.  车辆将取走所需物品,并卸下任何其他物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile to which the workshop will give items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个库存,车间将向其提供物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile from which the workshop will take items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个库存,车间将从中提取物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile to which the selected stockpile will give items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个储存库,所选储存库将向其提供物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Choose a stockpile from which the selected stockpile will take items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个储物堆,所选的储物堆将从中获取物品.

Unit report sheet popup: The track stop's vehicle will exchange items with this stockpile.  The vehicle will take desired items and offload any others.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 轨道站的车辆将与这个库存交换物品.  车辆将取走所需物品,并卸下任何其他物品.

Unit report sheet popup: The track stop's vehicle will take items from this stockpile.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 轨道站的车辆将从这个储存库中提取物品.

Unit report sheet popup: The selected workshop will take items from here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选定的研讨会将从这里开始进行项目.

Unit report sheet popup: The selected workshop will give items to here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 被选中的车间将向这里提供物品.

Unit report sheet popup: The selected stockpile will take items from here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选定的库存将从这里提取物品.

Unit report sheet popup: The selected stockpile will give items to here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选定的库存将向此处提供物品.

Unit report sheet popup: The creature is set to be chained.
The creature is set to be caged.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物被设置为关在笼子里.

Unit report sheet popup: The creature is assigned to a pasture.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物被分配到一个牧场.

Unit report sheet popup: The creature is assigned to a pond.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物被分配到一个池塘.

Unit report sheet popup: The creature is assigned to a pit.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该生物被分配到一个坑.
编辑重新定位的热键位置.

Unit report sheet popup: Recenter on the surface at this location.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这个位置的表面上重新定位.

Unit report sheet popup: Recenter on the deepest discovered area at this location.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这个位置上,将中心放在最深的被发现区域.
在这个位置上重新定位.

Unit report sheet popup: Set this entry to recenter on the current view.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 设置此条目以在当前视图上重新定位.
清除这个重新定位的热键位置.
清除这个重新定位的位置.

Unit report sheet popup: Display water and magma depth numerically (1 to 7.)
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用数字(1-7)显示水和岩浆的深度.

Unit report sheet popup: Show up and down arrows over ramps at the current elevation.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在当前高度处的斜坡上显示向上和向下箭头.

Unit report sheet popup: Zoom in on the play area.
Zoom out from the play area.
Open the stocks window, where you can see all of your fortress's items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 打开库存窗口,在这里你可以看到你的堡垒的所有物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Most tasks in the fortress are started and completed at workshops.  Tasks generally require raw materials and most workshops are constructed from boulders, blocks, or wood.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 要塞中的大多数任务都是在工场开始和完成的.  任务一般需要原材料,大多数工场都是由巨石, 木块或木材建造的.

Unit report sheet popup: Furnaces are used for smelting, glassmaking, pottery, ashmaking, or to make fuel from wood or raw coal.  Furnaces require fuel to function, or they can be set above magma.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 炉子用于冶炼, 玻璃制造, 制陶, 制灰,或用木材或原煤制造燃料.  炉子需要燃料才能运作,或者可以设置在岩浆之上.

Unit report sheet popup: These workshops are used in the clothesmaking process, whether dyeing and weaving or using tanned hides.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这些工场在制衣过程中,无论是染色和编织,还是使用鞣制的皮革,都会用到.

Unit report sheet popup: A wide variety of food-and-drink-related workshops can be found in this category.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这一类别中可以找到各种与食品和饮食有关的车间.

Unit report sheet popup: Use options in this category to place furniture that has already been constructed in a workshop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用这个类别的选项来放置已经在车间里建造好的家具.

Unit report sheet popup: Place doors and hatches here after you have constructed them in an appropriate workshop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在适当的车间里建造好门和舱门后,将其放在这里.

Unit report sheet popup: Most terrain-altering constructions can be found here, from walls and floors to bridges, ramps, stairs, and more.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 大多数改变地形的建筑都可以在这里找到,从墙壁和地板到桥梁, 坡道, 楼梯等等.

Unit report sheet popup: More complicated buildings from wells to powered machine components to levers and floodgates are found here.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 从水井到动力机械部件再到杠杆和水闸等更复杂的建筑在这里都能找到.

Unit report sheet popup: Cages, ropes, and animal traps are found here.  Cages can be used in cage traps or to transport large animals.  Metal cages and chains are also used by the justice system.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这里有笼子, 绳索和动物诱捕器.  笼子可用于笼中陷阱或运输大型动物.  金属笼子和铁链也被司法系统使用.

Unit report sheet popup: Various mechanical traps can be found here.  The pressure plate is also found here, which has applications beyond traps.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里可以找到各种机械陷阱.  这里还可以找到压力板,它的应用超出了陷阱.

Unit report sheet popup: Archery targets, siege weapons, and some ornamental display items can be found in this category.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 箭靶, 攻城武器和一些装饰性展示品都可以在这个类别中找到.

Unit report sheet popup: This crucial building is where all trading will be done.  Pack animals from distant civilizations will need to access this building from the edge of the map.  Later, wagons will need a clear 3-wide path to the depot.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这座关键的建筑是所有贸易的地方.  来自遥远文明的驮运动物将需要从地图的边缘进入这个建筑.  后来,马车将需要一条清晰的3米宽的小路通往车厂.

Unit report sheet popup: Used to make lye, potash, and milk of lime.  Construction requires blocks, barrel, and a bucket.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 用于制造碱液, 钾盐和石灰乳.  建造时需要木块, 木桶和一个水桶.

Unit report sheet popup: Make crossbows here from wood or bone.  The metalsmith's forge can be used for metal crossbows and metal bolts, and the crafts workshop is used to make other bolts.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里用木头或骨头制作弩箭.  金匠的锻造厂可以用来制作金属弩和金属螺栓,而手工艺作坊则用来制作其他的螺栓.

Unit report sheet popup: Make beds and various furniture here, as well as bins, barrels, and more.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里制作床铺和各种家具,以及垃圾桶,圆桶等.

Unit report sheet popup: Make crafts for trade and your own citizens here, as well as a variety of tools, armor, and bolts.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里为贸易和你自己的公民制作工艺品,以及各种工具, 盔甲和螺栓.

Unit report sheet popup: Cut rough gems here to increase their value, and improve the value of other objects by encrusting them with cut gems.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里切割粗糙的宝石以提高其价值,并可以通过镶嵌切割宝石以提高其他物品的价值.

Unit report sheet popup: Forge weapons and armor here, as well as most other metal objects from furniture to trap components.  Magma below the forge will power tasks.  You are responsible for placing the forge above the magma, but no other fuel is required.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里锻造武器和盔甲,以及家具和陷阱组件的大多数其他金属物品. 熔炉下方的岩浆将给工作提供动力. 你负责将熔炉放置在岩浆上方,但不需要任何燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Make mechanisms here which are used to make levers, pressure plates, and gears.  You can also use mechanisms to link levers and pressure plates to other machinery.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里用来制作杠杆, 压力板和齿轮.  你还可以用机械装置将杠杆和压力板与其他机械连接起来.

Unit report sheet popup: Forge weapons and armor here, as well as most other metal objects from furniture to trap components.  These tasks require fuel.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里锻造武器和盔甲,以及家具和陷阱组件的大多数其他金属物品. 这些任务需要燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Here you can make parts for ballistae and catapults.  This workshop is also the place where ballista ammo is assembled.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里你可以制造弩炮和弹射器的零件,这个工坊也是组装弩炮弹药的车间.

Unit report sheet popup: Make stone furniture here, as well as blocks which are used in constructions.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里制作石质家具,以及用于建筑的砖块.

Unit report sheet popup: Use leather tanned at the tanner's shop here to make clothing and tools, such as bags and waterskins.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用在这里的制革店来鞣制皮革以制作衣服和工具,如袋子和革制水袋.

Unit report sheet popup: Here you can turn thread into cloth, whether it is thread from the farmer's workshop or spider silk gathered underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里,你可以把线变成布,无论是来自农民工坊的线还是地底收集的蜘蛛丝.

Unit report sheet popup: Make cloth into clothing and tools here, such as bags and ropes.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里把布做成衣服和工具,比如包和绳索

Unit report sheet popup: Use dyes here to color thread and cloth.  Requires a barrel and bucket for construction.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里使用染料为线和布上色.  需要一个圆桶和水桶来建造.

Unit report sheet popup: Brew alcohol from plants, fruit, or honey.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 用植物, 水果或蜂蜜酿造酒精.

Unit report sheet popup: Slaughter livestock here in order to obtain meat, hides, bones, and other animal products.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里屠宰牲畜以获得肉, 皮, 骨头和其他畜产品.

Unit report sheet popup: Make leather from animal hides here.  You can also make parchment using milk of lime and a hide.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里用动物的皮毛制作皮革.  你也可以用石灰乳和一张皮制作羊皮纸.

Unit report sheet popup: Cook meals here.  You can also render fat into tallow.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里做饭.  你也可以将脂肪转化为牛油.

Unit report sheet popup: Process plants and work with livestock here.  Milk and shear animals, make cheese, and spin thread.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里加工植物并与牲畜一起工作.  挤奶和剪羊毛,制作奶酪,以及纺线.

Unit report sheet popup: Make sugar, flour, and various useful slurries here.  Tasks are completed very slowly compared to the powered millstone.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里制作糖, 面粉和各种有用的泥浆.  与动力磨石相比,任务完成得非常慢.

Unit report sheet popup: Capture and train small animals here.  Requires animal traps.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里捕捉和训练小动物.  需要动物陷阱.

Unit report sheet popup: Make sugar, flour, and various useful slurries here.  Powered version of the quern.  Must be hooked to a windmill or water wheel to function.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里制作糖, 面粉和各种有用的浆料.  石磨的高级版本.  必须与风车或水轮挂钩才能发挥作用.

Unit report sheet popup: You can make a variety of objects using three different types of glass.  You can also collect sand in bags from a task originating here, if you have a sand collection zone.  Glassmaking requires fuel.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以用三种不同类型的玻璃制作各种物品.  如果你有一个沙子收集区,你还可以从源自这里的任务中收集袋装沙子.  制作玻璃需要燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Bake clay objects here, as well as a few other useful materials.  Clay can also be collected here if you have a clay collection zone.  All tasks require fuel aside from clay collection.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里烘烤粘土物品,以及其他一些有用的材料.  如果你有一个粘土收集区,也可以在这里收集粘土.  除了收集粘土之外,所有的任务都需要燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: You can make a variety of objects using three different types of glass.  You can also collect sand in bags from a task originating here, if you have a sand collection zone.  Magma below the furnace will power tasks.  You are responsible for placing the furnace above the magma, but no other fuel is required.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以用三种不同类型的玻璃制作各种物体.  如果你有一个沙子收集区,你还可以从源自这里的任务中收集袋装沙子.  熔炉下面的岩浆会给任务提供动力.  你要负责将熔炉放在岩浆上方,但不需要其他燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Bake clay objects here, as well as a few other useful materials.  Clay can also be collected here if you have a clay collection zone.  Magma below the kiln will power tasks.  You are responsible for placing the kiln above the magma, but no other fuel is required.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里烘焙粘土制品,以及其他一些有用的材料. 如果你有一个粘土收集区,也可以在这里收集粘土. 窑下的岩浆将为任务提供动力. 你负责将窑置于岩浆之上,但不需要其他燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Make metal bars from ore here.  Can also refine coal into usable fuel or make alloys.  Magma below the smelter will power tasks.  You are responsible for placing the smelter above the magma, but no other fuel is required.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里用矿石制作金属条.  也可以将煤提炼成可用的燃料或制造合金.  冶炼厂下面的岩浆将为任务提供动力.  你要负责将冶炼厂放在岩浆之上,但不需要其他燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Make metal bars from ore here.  Can also refine coal into usable fuel or make alloys.  All tasks require fuel.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里用矿石制作金属条.  也可以将煤提炼成可用的燃料或制造合金.  所有任务都需要燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Make charcoal and ash from wood here.  Does not require fuel.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在这里用木材制作木炭和灰烬.  不需要燃料.

Unit report sheet popup: Plant crops at the farmplot.  You will need seeds or spawn and must select crops by season.  Crops can be fertilized with potash.  Soil is richer deeper underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在农田里种植农作物.  你需要种子或卵子,必须按季节选择农作物.  农作物可以用钾肥施肥.  土壤在地下深处更丰富.

Unit report sheet popup: When placed, a female bird will claim the box and start laying eggs, if one is available.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 当被放置时,如果有一个盒子的话,一只雌鸟会认领这个盒子并开始下蛋.

Unit report sheet popup: Keep a colony of insects at your hives.  A wild colony must be collected after the hive is placed, or a colony can be split from an existing hive colony.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在你的蜂巢中保持一个虫群.  必须在放置蜂巢后收集一个野生蜂群,或者从现有的蜂巢群中分出一个蜂群.

Unit report sheet popup: Your citizens need a comfortable place to sleep.  A bed object must be made at the carpenter's shop before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你的公民需要一个舒适的地方来睡觉.  床的物件必须在木匠的商店里制作,然后才能放置.

Unit report sheet popup: Tables are required for dining.  A chair should be placed adjacent to the table.  A table object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 用餐时需要有桌子.  应在桌子旁边放置一把椅子.  桌子上的物品必须在放置前制作好.

Unit report sheet popup: Chests and coffers are used in personal bedrooms for storing non-clothing objects.  They are also used in some zone-based locations like taverns, hospitals, and libraries for storing useful materials.  A box object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 箱子和保险箱用于个人卧室,用于储存非衣物物品.  它们也被用于一些区域性的场所,如酒馆, 医院和图书馆,用于储存有用的材料.  在放置箱子之前,必须先制作一个箱子对象.

Unit report sheet popup: Cabinets are used in personal bedrooms for storing clothing objects.  A cabinet object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 柜子用于个人卧室,用于存放衣物物件.  柜子里的物件必须先做出来,然后才能放置.

Unit report sheet popup: The dead are buried in coffins.  Coffins must be placed in their own tomb zone in order to work.  A coffin object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 死者被埋在棺材里.  棺材必须放置在自己的墓区才能发挥作用.  在放置棺材之前,必须先制作一个棺材对象.

Unit report sheet popup: Citizens that cannot be buried properly can still be memorialized on slabs.  Slabs are created and engraved at the stoneworker's shop.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 不能正确埋葬的公民仍然可以在石板上留念.  石板是在石匠的店里制作和雕刻的.

Unit report sheet popup: Statues can be used to decorate your fortress and add value to your rooms.  A statue object must be made at an appropriate workshop first.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 雕像可以用来装饰你的堡垒,为你的房间增加价值.  雕像对象必须先在适当的工场制作.

Unit report sheet popup: Certain injuries such as overlapping fractures require advanced medical contraptions like the traction bench for treatment.  A traction bench object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 某些伤害,如重叠骨折,需要像牵引凳这样的先进医疗装置进行治疗.  牵引凳的物件必须在放置前制作好.

Unit report sheet popup: Codices and scrolls in your library can be stored in bookcases.  A bookcase object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你图书馆中的法典和卷轴可以存放在书柜中.  在放置书柜之前,必须先制作一个书柜对象.

Unit report sheet popup: Your most valuable objects can be placed for display in rooms to increase their value and to entertain passing citizens.  A pedestal or display case must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你最有价值的物品可以放在房间里展示,以提高其价值,并招待过往的市民.  在放置之前必须先制作一个基座或展示柜.

Unit report sheet popup: These ornamental objects increase the value of rooms in which they are placed.  An offering place object must be made before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这些装饰品能提高它们所处房间的价值.  在摆放之前,必须先制作一个供奉的物品.

Unit report sheet popup: Large instruments must be placed in taverns or temples before they will be used.  These instruments must be assembled at a workshop first.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 大型仪器在使用前必须放在酒馆或寺庙中.  这些乐器必须先在工场进行组装.

Unit report sheet popup: Doors can be used along with walls to enclose rooms, which is especially important when placing multiple zones at once.  Doors can also be forbidden or attached to levers to control movement in the fort.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 门可以和墙一起用来封闭房间,这在同时放置多个区域时尤其重要.  门也可以被禁止或连接到杠杆上,以控制堡垒中的运动.

Unit report sheet popup: Hatches can be placed at the tops of stairwells or above ramps to control movement in the fort when they are forbidden or attached to levers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 舱口可以放置在楼梯间的顶部或坡道上方,以控制堡垒中的运动,当它们被禁止或连接到杠杆时.

Unit report sheet popup: Bridges can be used to span open spaces or placed above water or magma.  Bridges can be connected to levers and raised to block access.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 桥梁可以用来跨越空旷的空间,或者放置在水或岩浆之上.  桥梁可以与杠杆相连,并升起以阻断通道.

Unit report sheet popup: Paved roads use less materials than constructed floors and can be used to stop plants from growing over wagon trails.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 铺设的道路比建造的地板使用更少的材料,可以用来阻止植物在马车道上生长.

Unit report sheet popup: Dirt roads do not require materials, but the dirt road may quickly be overgrown by plants.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 土路不需要材料,但土路可能很快就会被植物所覆盖.

Unit report sheet popup: Blocks creatures but allows the passage of fluids and items.  Can be built on any floor.  Grates unlike bars have a quality and enhance the value of rooms.  Grates can be connected to levers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 阻挡生物,但允许液体和物品通过.  可以建在任何楼层.  栅栏与酒吧不同,它具有质量,可以提高房间的价值.  栅栏可以与杠杆连接.

Unit report sheet popup: Blocks creatures but allows the passage of fluids and items.  Can be built over empty spaces, stairs, ramps, or above liquids.  Grates unlike bars have a quality and enhance the value of rooms.  Grates can be connected to levers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 阻挡生物,但允许液体和物品通过.  可以建在空地, 楼梯, 坡道或液体上方.  栅栏与酒吧不同,它具有质量,可以提高房间的价值.  栅栏可以与杠杆连接.

Unit report sheet popup: Blocks creatures but allows the passage of fluids and items.  Can be built on any floor.  Bars unlike grates do not have a quality and so do not enhance the value of rooms significantly.  Bars can be connected to levers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 阻挡生物,但允许液体和物品通过.  可以建在任何楼层.  栏杆与栅栏不同,没有质量,因此不能显著提高房间的价值.  栏杆可以与杠杆连接.

Unit report sheet popup: Blocks creatures but allows the passage of fluids and items.  Can be built over empty spaces, stairs, ramps, or above liquids.  Bars unlike grates do not have a quality and so do not enhance the value of rooms significantly.  Bars can be connected to levers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 阻挡生物,但允许液体和物品通过.  可以建在空地, 楼梯, 坡道或液体上方.  栏杆与栅栏不同,没有质量,因此不能显著提高房间的价值.  栏杆可以与杠杆相连.

Unit report sheet popup: This ornamental construction can enhance the value of rooms.  A window object must be made at a glass furnace before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这种装饰性建筑可以提高房间的价值.  窗户的物件必须在玻璃熔炉中制作,然后才能放置.

Unit report sheet popup: This ornamental construction can enhance the value of rooms.  Three cut gem objects must be made at a jeweler's shop before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 这种装饰性建筑可以提高房间的价值.  三种切割的宝石物体必须在珠宝店制作,然后才能放置.

Unit report sheet popup: Supports will stop cave-ins in the rare event you completely detach a piece of your fortress.  Otherwise, they are ornamental.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在你完全脱离你的堡垒的极少数情况下,支撑物可以阻止塌陷的发生.  否则,它们是装饰性的.

Unit report sheet popup: You can build walls aboveground, in caverns, or in spaces you have mined out in order to block the passage of creatures, objects, and fluids.  Requires boulder, block, or wood.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以在地上, 洞穴或你挖出的空间中建造墙壁,以阻挡生物, 物体和液体的通过. 需要巨石, 块或木头.

Unit report sheet popup: You can place floors for functional reasons or to enhance the appearance of the fortress.  Requires boulder, block, or wood.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以出于功能上的考虑或为了增强堡垒的外观而放置地板.  需要巨石, 木块或木材.

Unit report sheet popup: You can build a ramp next to a wall to provide access to the floor above.  The space above the ramp must also be empty.  Requires boulder, block, or wood.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以在墙边建一个坡道,以提供通往上方楼层的通道.  坡道上方的空间也必须是空的.  需要巨石, 木块或木材.

Unit report sheet popup: You can build staircases to connect different elevations.  Staircases must span at least two elevations.  Requires boulder, block, or wood.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以建造楼梯来连接不同的楼层.  楼梯必须至少横跨两层楼.  需要巨石, 木块或木材.

Unit report sheet popup: Fortifications block creature movement but allow projectiles through.  Soldiers near fortifications are reasonably safe from incoming projectiles.  Requires boulder, block, or wood.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 防御工事能阻挡住其他生物通过,但投掷物能越过它们. 在防御工事附近的战士们面对飞来的炮弹来说是相对安全的. 它需要石块, 石头或原木.

Unit report sheet popup: Use minecart tracks in conjunction with the hauling menu.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 结合牵引菜单使用矿车轨道.

Unit report sheet popup: Place the well in an open space above water to provide a relatively safe area for your citizens to draw water.  Requires mechanisms, blocks, a chain or rope, and a bucket.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 把井安置在水面的空地上,为你的公民提供一个相对安全的取水区域.  需要机械, 方块, 链条或绳子和水桶.

Unit report sheet popup: Use floodgates to control the flow of fluids between spaces in your fortress.  Must be attached to a lever or pressure plate to function.  Requires a floodgate object to be built before it can be placed.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用水闸来控制你堡垒中各空间之间的液体流动.  必须连接到一个杠杆或压力板上才能发挥作用.  需要先建造一个水闸物体才能放置.

Unit report sheet popup: Use a screw pump to move liquids upward from the elevation below the pump to the same elevation as the pump.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用螺杆泵将液体从泵下面的标高向上移动到与泵相同的标高.

Unit report sheet popup: Place the water wheel above flowing water to generate power for machines, such as the millstone or screw pump.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将水车置于流水之上,为机器发电,如磨石或螺旋泵.

Unit report sheet popup: Place the windmill aboveground to generate power for machines, such as the millstone or screw pump.  Not all areas have strong winds.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 将风车放在地面上,为机器发电,如磨石或螺旋泵.  并非所有地区都有强风.

Unit report sheet popup: Use the gear assembly to connect axles and machinery together.  Gear assemblies can be disengaged temporarily by linking them to levers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 使用齿轮组件将轴和机械连接在一起.  齿轮组件可以通过与杠杆的连接而暂时脱离.

Unit report sheet popup: Horizontal axles transfer power on the same elevation.  Horizontal axles can be east-west or north-south.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 水平轴在同一海拔高度上传递动力.  水平轴可以是东西或南北朝向的.

Unit report sheet popup: Vertical axles transfer power between two adjacent elevations.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 垂直轴在两个相邻的立面之间传递动力.

Unit report sheet popup: Rollers move minecarts on tracks without the need for a citizen to push or guide the minecart.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 滚筒在轨道上移动矿车,不需要市民推动或引导矿车.

Unit report sheet popup: A chain can be placed for use in the justice system or for the restraint of an animal.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 链条可以放在司法系统中使用,也可以用于约束动物.

Unit report sheet popup: Cages can be used to contain an animal, and metal cages can be used by the justice system.  Glass cages can be filled with water and used as aquariums.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 笼子可以用来关押动物,金属笼子可以被司法系统使用.  玻璃笼子可以装满水,作为水族馆使用.

Unit report sheet popup: Animal traps can be placed in the wild and baited with meat, plants, or gems, in order to catch small creatures.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 动物陷阱可以放置在野外,用肉, 植物或宝石作诱饵,以捕捉小动物.

Unit report sheet popup: Track stops are used in conjunction with the hauling menu.  They can also be used to add friction to minecart tracks.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 轨道止动器是与牵引菜单一起使用的.  它们也可以用来给矿车轨道增加摩擦力.

Unit report sheet popup: Levers are used with machines, doors, floodgates, bridges, cages, and other structures to change their state.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 杠杆用于机器, 门, 水闸, 桥梁, 笼子和其他结构,一起使用以改变其状态.

Unit report sheet popup: Pressure plates, like levers, are used with machines, doors, floodgates, bridges, cages, and other structures to change their state.  The trigger for pressure plates can be set by creature weight, fluid, or minecart passage.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 压力板,像杠杆一样,用于机器, 门, 水闸, 桥梁, 笼子和其他结构,以改变其状态.  压力板的触发器可以由生物的重量, 液体或矿车通道来设定.

Unit report sheet popup: Stone-fall traps drop a stone on intruders.  Must be loaded with boulders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 落石陷阱向入侵者投下一块石头. 必须装载巨石.

Unit report sheet popup: Weapon traps use a weapon or trap component to strike intruders.  Can be used with ranged weapons and loaded with ammo.  Can use multiple weapons at once.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 武器陷阱使用武器或陷阱组件来打击入侵者.  可以使用远程武器并装载弹药.  可以同时使用多种武器.

Unit report sheet popup: Cage traps capture intruders in cages.  Must be loaded with a cage.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 笼子陷阱把入侵者捕捉在笼子里. 必须装有笼子.

Unit report sheet popup: Upright weapons are a nasty place for intruders to fall upon.  Can also be linked to levers or pressure plates to raise them into intruders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 直立的武器是入侵者最怕的.  也可以与杠杆或压力板相连,将其贯穿到入侵者身上.

Unit report sheet popup: Archery targets are used in archery range zones for training archers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 射箭靶在靶场区使用,用来训练射手.
装饰品. 一些贵族需要它们.

Unit report sheet popup: A ballista fires a ballista arrow in one of the four cardinal directions.  The operator can adjust the aim slightly.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 弩炮朝四个主要方向之一发射弩箭. 操作员可以稍微调整目标.

Unit report sheet popup: A catapult fires a boulder in one of the four cardinal directions.  The operator can adjust the aim slightly.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 弹射器向四个方向中的一个方向发射巨石.  操作者可以稍微调整目标.

Unit report sheet popup: Create a creature to place in the arena.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 在演武场中放置一个生物

Unit report sheet popup: Remove fluids and spatter from the arena.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 从演武场中去除液体和溅落液滴

Unit report sheet popup: Create a tree to place in the arena.
You can recenter on certain announcements.  Right click to close.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你可以重新定位某些通告. 点击右键关闭.

Unit report sheet popup: Select a report to view the full text.  Right click to close.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 选择一个报告查看全文. 点击右键关闭.

Unit report sheet popup: the construction and use of the chariot odometer
商品报告表弹出窗口: 战车里程表的构造和使用

Unit report sheet popup: Make requests for next year's caravan.  They'll charge more for these items.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 向商队预定明年的货物. 这些物品他们会要价更高.

Unit report sheet popup: We will gladly do as you ask and strengthen our bonds of friendship.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我们很乐意按你们的要求去做并加强我们的友谊.

Unit report sheet popup: Sadly, we do not possess this object.  Best of luck in your search.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 遗憾的是,我们并没有这一物品.  祝您在搜索过程中好运.

Unit report sheet popup: Give up this childish errand.  We do not part with our treasures lightly.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 放弃这幼稚的差事吧,我们不会轻易交出我们的财宝的.

Unit report sheet popup: Your claim is worthless here.  Trade your lives if you must.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 你的宣称在此毫无价值,如果你坚持要这么做,那就用你的生命来交换.

Unit report sheet popup: I hear the call.  Let us stop this war.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我听到了召唤. 让我们停止这场战争.

Unit report sheet popup: We will drown out the call with the screams of your dying.  Begone.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我们会用你临死前的尖叫声盖过你的叫声. 滚开.

Unit report sheet popup: I can scarcely believe this good news!  I have some recommendations.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我简直不敢相信这个好消息!我有一些建议.

Unit report sheet popup: Flattering, but we'd rather maintain our distance from the homeland.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 荣幸之至,但我们宁愿与祖国保持距离.

Unit report sheet popup: We can abide by this.  Let us work toward mutual co-existence.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我们会遵守的. 让我们一起努力,包容共存吧.

Unit report sheet popup: Our needs exceed your allowances.  Relax.  They're only trees.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我们需要的比你允许的更多. 放轻松吧,它们只是树而已.

Unit report sheet popup: We can grant this request.  Let's discuss the specifics, though...
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我们可以批准这个请求. 不过,让我们讨论一下细节......

Unit report sheet popup: We cannot stop production just because of your quaint sensibilities.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我们不能因为你古板的情怀就停止生产.

Unit report sheet popup: You do not have an official capable of handling these matters.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 您没有能够处理这些事务的官员.

Unit report sheet popup: There are no petitions that need your attention.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 目前没有访客提出居住申请.

Unit report sheet popup: a temple complex and high priest
The location must be built and furnished,
商品报告表弹出窗口: 该地点必须建成并配备家具.

Unit report sheet popup: with the new position appointed by you.
with the hall designated for a
, and I aim to return it home.
I've searched nearly the whole world over.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 我几乎把全世界都搜寻过了

Unit report sheet popup: I can only rest when I've brought the prize safely to

Unit report sheet popup: One must always be loyal to their cause and the ones they serve.

Unit report sheet popup: How can society function without loyalty?  We must be able to have faith in each other.

Unit report sheet popup: You must never forget true loyalty.  Repay it in full.

Unit report sheet popup: Never lose yourself in loyalty.  You know what is best for yourself.

Unit report sheet popup: The whole idea of loyalty is pointless.  Acting purely out of loyalty implies acting against one's own best interest.

Unit report sheet popup: Don't serve anyone blindly.  You'll only get into trouble.

Unit report sheet popup: Consider your loyalties carefully, adhere to them while they last, and abandon them when you must.

Unit report sheet popup: You should only maintain loyalty so long as something more important is not at stake.

Unit report sheet popup: Loyalty has value, but you should always keep the broader picture in mind.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 忠诚度具有价值,但您应始终牢记更广泛的情况.

Unit report sheet popup: Family is the true bond that keeps society thriving.

Unit report sheet popup: You can always rely on your family when everything else falls away.

Unit report sheet popup: How great it is to be surrounded by family!

Unit report sheet popup: You can be powerful or powerless.  The choice is yours, until somebody makes it for you.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  Farewell, [VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:NOBLE].  I look forward to our meeting next year.  Our fortunes rise and fall together.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  再会了, [VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:NOBLE].  我期待着我们明年的会面.  我们的命运是荣辱与共的.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  I am your liaison from the Mountainhomes.  Let's discuss your situation.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  我是你的联络人,来自山居城.  让我们讨论一下你的情况.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  You have disrespected the trees in this area, but this is what we have come to expect from your stunted kind.  Further abuse cannot be tolerated.  Let this be a warning to you.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  你们不尊重这个地区的树木,但是我们还是希望给你们这些贱类一次改过的机会.  再敢倒行逆施绝不可容忍.  这是我们对你们的最后通牒.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  What a pleasant surprise!  Not a single tree here weeps from the abuses meted out with such ease by your people.  Joy!  The dwarves have turned a page, not that we would make paper.  A travesty!  Perhaps it is better said that the dwarves have turned over a new leaf, and the springtime for our two races has only just begun.
商品报告表弹出窗口: VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]: 多么令人惊喜啊!这里没有一棵树因为你们的人如此轻易的虐待而哭泣.  这里没有一棵树因为你们的人如此轻松地虐待而哭泣.  喜悦! 矮人已经翻开了新的一页,不是说我们要做纸.  一个悲剧! 也许应该说,矮人已经翻开了新的一页,我们两个种族的春天才刚刚开始.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  Although we do not always see eye to eye (ha!), I bid you farewell.  May you someday embrace nature as you embrace the rocks and mud.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  虽然我们并不总是意见一致(哈!),但我向你告别.  愿你有一天能像拥抱岩石和泥土一样拥抱大自然.

Unit report sheet popup: [C:VAR:MEETING:ACTOR][VAR:NATIVENAME:MEETING:ACTOR]:  Greetings from the woodlands.  We have much to discuss.

[B]The rhythm system is fundamentally polyrhythmic.  There are always multiple rhythm lines, and each of their bars is played over the same period of time, regardless of the number of beats.  The rhythm lines are thought of as one, without a primary-subordinate relationship, though individual lines can be named.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [B]节奏系统基本上是多节律的. 总是存在多个节奏线,并且无论节拍的数量如何,它们的每个条都在相同的时间段内播放. 节奏线被认为是一个,没有主从关系,尽管可以命名单独的线.

Unit report sheet popup: [B]The rhythm system is fundamentally polymetric.  There are always multiple rhythm lines, and the beats are always played together, even if one rhythm line completes (and then repeats) before the other is finished.  The rhythm lines are thought of as one, without a primary-subordinate relationship, though individual lines can be named.
商品报告表弹出窗口: [B]节奏系统基本上是聚合的. 总是存在多个节奏线,并且即使一个节奏线在另一个节奏线完成之前完成(然后重复),节拍总是一起播放. 节奏线被认为是一个,没有主从关系,尽管可以命名单独的线.

商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种生活在地底的透明无定形的怪物. 它体型很小,会在洞穴地面爬行. 它的器官似乎漂浮在身体内部.

Unit report sheet popup: A large quadruped with a mane circling its manlike face and hands at the end of its forelimbs.  It lives underground and is fond of raiding the supplies of cavern outposts.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种大型四足动物,鬃毛环绕着像人一样的脸,前肢末端有手. 它生活在地底,喜欢掠夺洞穴前哨的补给.

Unit report sheet popup: A small underground monster that crawls across the cavern wall with its four clawed hands.  It has a single large eye which can shine with its own light, otherwise its stony skin blends in with the rock.  It has no mouth and is said to feed on evil alone.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种可以用四爪爬过洞穴墙壁的小型地底怪物.  它有一只可以自己发光的大眼睛,此外它像石头一样的皮肤会与岩石融为一体.  它没有嘴,据说只以邪恶为食.

Unit report sheet popup: A huge cave monster with hundreds of feet moving along the bottom of its long body.  In place of a head, it has an enormous toothy maw.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一只巨大的洞穴怪物,长长的身体下有着数百只脚. 头上还长着一个尖牙遍布的巨口.

Unit report sheet popup: A large cavern-dwelling humanoid monster.  It has a gaping mouth with many sharp teeth.  It has no eyes and only two digits on each hand and foot.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种巨大的穴居人型怪物. 它长着一张有许多锋利的牙齿的裂口嘴.  它没有眼睛,每只手和脚只有两个指头.

Unit report sheet popup: A tiny amphibian with a long prehensile tail.  It lives in underground swamps and tower-cap forests on which it feeds.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种微型两栖动物,尾巴长且可以抓握.  它生活在地底沼泽和塔菇林中,以其为食.

Unit report sheet popup: A small rock-eating creature that lives in molten rock.  It scurries on little feet and swims through liquid rock with sharp wings.  It uses magma to digest rock and spits out burning globs.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种生活在熔岩中的小型食岩生物. 它用小脚奔跑,用锋利的鳍游过熔岩. 它利用岩浆消化岩石并喷出燃烧的熔岩球.

Unit report sheet popup: spit a glob of molten rock
spits a glob of molten rock
A tiny underground monster with large claws and horns.  It walks on two legs and is dangerous when encountered in large numbers.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 长着大爪子和角的地底小怪物. 它用两条腿走路,当遭遇很多的时候是非常危险的.

Unit report sheet popup: A fearsome, long-toothed mouth the size of a man's head, flying on bat wings.  It is found in deep caves.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 有着一个长着长牙的嘴巴,有一个人的头那么大,用蝙蝠的翅膀飞翔. 它在深层洞穴中被发现.

Unit report sheet popup: A large ball of skin found moving around the debris near underground ponds.  It is there that it absorbs dead matter for food.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一球很大的毛皮,据发现它在地底池塘附近的碎石中移动.  它正是在那里吸收死物为食.

Unit report sheet popup: A large creature found grazing on mushrooms deep underground.  It walks on two legs and has the head of a bird with the antlers of a great elk.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种被发现在地底深处进食蘑菇的大型生物.他们用两条腿行进并且有着鸟的头部和大型麋鹿的角.

Unit report sheet popup: A snake-like creature living deep underground.  Its head is covered in armor so that is resembles the head of a dragon.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种生活在地底深处的蛇形生物.  它的头部被盔甲覆盖,就像龙头一样

Unit report sheet popup: A medium-sized monster walking on two clawed legs.  It has two mouths on the ends of a pair of tentacles.  It uses its mouths to digest its victims with acid and rows of razor-like teeth.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种用两条带有爪子的腿行走的中等体型的怪物.在它的一对触手的末端有两张吸嘴.它用带有嘴的触手通过酸液和一排像剃刀般的牙齿来消化被捕获的生物.

Unit report sheet popup: A huge monster with an enormous tail, covered with thick fur.  They run on four legs and can be found deep under the earth.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一个巨大的怪物,有一条巨大的尾巴,覆盖着厚厚的毛皮. 它们用四条腿跑步,可以在地底深处找到.

Unit report sheet popup: A tiny underground creature made of a mass of appendages resembling human fingers.  It creeps across the ground like a starfish and eats with a mouth on the bottom of its body.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种由很多人类手指一样的附肢组成的极小的地底生物. 它像海星一样在地上爬行,并且用长在身体底部的嘴进食.

Unit report sheet popup: A large, long-bodied grazer with a thick mane that feeds on the tops of towercap mushrooms deep under the earth.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种长着厚鬃毛的,身体细长的,巨大食草动物. 它以地底深层的塔菇伞盖为食.

Unit report sheet popup: A gigantic version of its tiny cousin, this long, slimy creature tunnels through the rocks deep underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 它是其表亲的一个巨大变种,这种又长又黏糊的生物在深层地底的岩石中打洞穿行.

Unit report sheet popup: A man-shaped abomination made entirely of blood.  These cursed creatures are only found very near the underworld.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种完全由血构成的人型可憎之物. 你只能在非常靠近地狱的地方找到这些被诅咒的生物.

Unit report sheet popup: A small bat-like creature with the head of an insect.  It is found deep underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种长着虫头的小型蝠类生物,被发现于地底

Unit report sheet popup: A creature that crawls along the cavern ceiling with four long arms.  Its body is shaped as the head of a man with a mouth full of shark teeth.  It waits for its prey to pass below.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种长着四条长胳膊匍匐于洞穴顶棚的生物. 它的身体就像是一个满嘴尖牙的人类脑袋. 它等待着猎物从下面经过.

Unit report sheet popup: A hideous monster that has the body of a giant mole-rat and the torso of a mole-rat man.   It is found deep underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种长着巨鼹鼠身体和鼹鼠人躯干的可怕怪物,被发现于深层地底.

Unit report sheet popup: A huge monster that lurks in caverns deep under the earth.  It uses its wide beak to reach down and pluck up unsuspecting intruders.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一只巨大的怪物,潜伏于地底深处的洞穴之中. 它用那宽大的喙去取起并叼走毫无警觉的入侵者.

Unit report sheet popup: A small creature that lives in watery ditches deep underground.  It has a sharp beak and four tentacles with claws at the end.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种生活在深层地底水沟里的小型生物. 它长着尖喙,和四条末端带有爪子的触手.

Unit report sheet popup: A huge emaciated-looking bear with great drooping ears and many sharp teeth.  It is found deep underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种长着大垂耳和许多尖牙的,体形消瘦的巨熊. 被发现于深层地底.

Unit report sheet popup: A gigantic monster, once a dragon, now adapted to and polluted by the underground.  Its wings fall limp at its side.  Its face is full of incredibly long teeth.  Its eyes are large to penetrate the darkness.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种曾经是龙,如今被地底污染且适应于地底环境的巨型怪物. 它的翅膀耷拉在体侧,脸上长满令人难以置信的长牙,眼睛大到足以洞悉黑暗.

Unit report sheet popup: A humanoid monster found lurking far underground.  It feigns death, usually near water, until a victim passes by.  It then uses its long arms to drag its prey into the water to drown or strangle them.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一种潜伏在遥远地底的类人怪物. 它通常在水边装死,直到猎物靠近. 然后用其长臂把猎物拖进水中来淹死或勒死他们.

Unit report sheet popup: Living gabbro in the shape of a man.  These strange creatures are found deep underground.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 活的人形辉长岩. 这些奇怪的生物是在地底深处被发现的.

Unit report sheet popup: A small, round humanoid found wandering the caves deep underground.  Most of its body is taken up by a huge tusked mouth.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一个小而圆的类人生物,在地底深处的洞穴中游荡. 它身体的大部分都被长牙着獠牙的大嘴占据了.

Unit report sheet popup: A floating pod with eye-stalks.  It can spray poison and it gives off poison gas when punctured.
商品报告表弹出窗口: 一个漂浮着的长有眼柄的豆荚. 它能喷射毒液,被刺穿时会释放毒气. .
